```{r, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(stringr)
source("helper.R")
```

```{r}
raw_data <- read.csv("data/master.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
```

```{r}
q <- 'Were.you.exposed.to.any.of.the.following.during.your.service...Please.select.all.that.apply.'
q_final_response <- "X.385"
t <- "Were you exposed to any of the following during your service? (Please select all that apply)"
q_data <- get_choose_all(raw_data, q.name = q, f.response = q_final_response) %>%
  tidy_choose_all()
q_n <- length(unique(q_data$id))
```

```{r}
q_plot <- clean_choose_all(q_data)
r <- plot_choose_all(q_plot)
r
```

```{r}
ggsave(filename = 'q79_service_exposure.png', plot = r, device = 'png')
write.csv(q_plot, 'q79_service_exposure_142.csv', row.names = FALSE)
write.csv(q_data, 'q79_service_exposure_ids.csv', row.names = FALSE)
```

```{r}
qf_data <- q_data %>%
  filter(chosen == "Response text")
```

```{r}
qf_all_data <- 
  qf_data %>%
  inner_join(q_data, by = "id")

qf_n <- length(unique(qf_all_data$id))
```

```{r}
q_plot <- clean_choose_all_f(qf_all_data)
r <- plot_choose_all_f(q_plot)
r
```

```{r}
ggsave(filename = 'q79_service_exposure.png', plot = r, device = 'png')
write.csv(q_plot, 'q79_service_exposure_329.csv', row.names = FALSE)
write.csv(qf_data, 'q79_service_exposure_ids.csv', row.names = FALSE)
```
